name: Alex Bushmanov (relocation, remote, on-site)
summary: Experienced Frontend Developer with 10 years of expertise in JavaScript and modern frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue.js, collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions and staying up-to-date with industry trends.

experiences.description: Embedded in The New York Times messaging team through RE-Partners. Focused on audience segmentation, infrastructure reliability, and developer mentoring.
keyNotes: Built and maintained scalable messaging tools for audience segmentation, subscription tracking, and delivery monitoring at NYT.
Improved infrastructure reliability and monitoring with GCP, Datadog, and Terraform.
Prototyped new messaging features and delivery systems.
Mentored engineers and led interview training sessions at RE-Partners.
Conducted 100+ interviews for senior/staff-level roles (e.g. Citibank, Gymshark).
Fostered internal engagement through async tech quizzes and team events.

experiences.description: Worked on a high-performance game launcher for Jagex‚Äôs RuneScape franchise. Focused on UI responsiveness and cross-platform stability.

Shipped critical updates and streamlined bug reporting workflow.

experiences.position: Senior Software Engineer / Cross-Functional Product Expert
experiences.description: Led key frontend and infrastructure initiatives for a large-scale trading platform with 60M+ users.
keyNotes: Engineered decentralized caching for AWS architecture serving 500K+ daily requests.

Developed mobile web features for a major Russian bank as guest engineer.
Improved interview pipeline for LatAm/Russian hires through technical leadership.
